newsitem.title: UK: Blue Circle builds on gain after agm.
newsitem.headline: Blue Circle builds on gain after agm.

text.p: Shares in Blue Circle Industries Plc put on 6-1/2p to 421p as the market showed its relief that no bad news came out of Friday's annual general meeting, analysts said.
The shares were 3p ahead immediately before Blue Circle said its cement business gained in the first four months of the year from increased demand and prices.
"Everything they said was what they'd said when they put out their results. Nothing's changed since then and so we are seeing the relief factor in the share price," said one analyst.
Analysts said they were not likely to change profits forecasts based on today's news.
